commenter_a: The cures are out there stop suppressing them
post_message: Real talk for a second: someone I love very much has recently been diagnosed with terminal cancer, and I find myself growing even angrier with the charlatans who promise miracle cures and insult the incredible doctors and scientists who are working so hard to help the people afflicted with this terrible disease. They prey on desperate and sick people to line their own pockets. "There is no alternative medicine. There is only medicine that works and medicine that doesn't work." Richard Dawkins Image via the Food Hunk.
